Title: Customize Retries on Keywords AI
introduction:
Retries feature: When an LLM call fails, our system detects the error and retries the request to prevent failover. 

 Customize your Retries settings! 
- Set number of retries 
- Define initial retry time in seconds

New.description: You can now disable streaming in the Playground.
Added a new Warning page, you can now customize warnings when any anomalies are detected.
You can now use Keywords AI's credential as fallback if your own credentials don't work.

Improved.description: You can now view Top models by TTFT (Time to First Token) in the Dashboard.
